com.cba.inmemorycache

Class LRUMemoryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cba.inmemorycache.LRUMemoryCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryCache, Serializable

    public class LRUMemoryCache
extends Object
implements MemoryCache, Serializable
    LRUMemoryCache provides a cache in which the Least Recently Used items move to the end of the list.
    Author:
    Van Hai Ho
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        If the key or the value is null, and InvalidArgumentException is thrown.
